Sentencas: An integrated tri-generation system incorporating a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and a double-effect water/Lithium Bromide absorption chiller is presented in this paper.
Titulo: Investigation on performance of an integrated solid oxide fuel cell and absorption chiller tri-generation system

Sentencas: The proposed tri-generation system can provide power, cooling or heating simultaneously with a typical gas produced from a gasification process.
Titulo: Investigation on performance of an integrated solid oxide fuel cell and absorption chiller tri-generation system

Sentencas: The system configuration and design are discussed, and the energy and mass balances are obtained through the matrix representation method and integrated into a simulation program by MATLAB soft package.
Titulo: Investigation on performance of an integrated solid oxide fuel cell and absorption chiller tri-generation system

Sentencas: The developed model comprises of three modules: SOFC module, exhaust combusting and HRSG module, and the absorption chiller module.
Titulo: Investigation on performance of an integrated solid oxide fuel cell and absorption chiller tri-generation system

Sentencas: Validation of the SOFC model is performed by comparison with a single tubular cell of Siemens-Westinghouse, and a specific case study of the system is presented.
Titulo: Investigation on performance of an integrated solid oxide fuel cell and absorption chiller tri-generation system

Sentencas: For parametric analysis, the fuel utilization ratio, fuel flow ratio and air inlet temperature are investigated and the results are discussed in detail.
Titulo: Investigation on performance of an integrated solid oxide fuel cell and absorption chiller tri-generation system
Investigation on performance of an integrated solid oxide fuel cell and absorption chiller tri-generation system
